Room.Name: Main Courtyard - South
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the south side of the main courtyard.
Room.LongDescription: A lot of heavy battle equipment is in storage here. There is a ramp leading up to the castle's battlements over to the northeast. The equipment waits at the foot of the ramp, ready for use at the sound of the alarm trumpets. A fire is kept burning at all times, and cauldrons of oil are bubbling, constantly in readiness.
